summary: This folder serves as the CLI command layer for the VastLab CLI, translating user input into operations for GPU instance management, file transfers, and cloud synchronization. It implements a comprehensive suite of commands for the full lifecycle of remote GPU development, from provisioning and environment injection to training execution and cleanup.
responsibilities: Orchestrate GPU instance lifecycle (start, stop, kill, refresh) via Vast.ai API.
Manage local and cloud-synced provisioning profiles for standardized environment setup.
Automate secure file transfers and backups using rsync and SFTP wrappers.
Handle automated environment variable and credential injection into remote instances via SSH.
Execute and monitor machine learning training jobs with tmux and W&B integration.
Manage CLI configuration, authentication tokens, and local instance registries.
